review.title: “Good place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Very good people, you can take time on your own if you need (in agree with your boss of course)In summer (8 weeks) the working hours are just in the morning
review.cons: Cons – Salaries are low, working hours should be just in the morning all the year and should encourage working from home
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
